name: Country Inn & Suites Tampa Airport N

reviews.text: My stay was great at this hotel. Not too far from the beaches and Busch Gardens. Breakfast was pretty good- included bacon, eggs, sausage, waffles, pancakes and more. The service was on point and the room was very comfortable and well designed. The only issue I had was the A/C. When it was on, it was loud and if you were to walk past the vent, the cold air would blow right on you as if you just walked into a freezer. Other than that, I loved the hotel.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed for 4 nights on a business trip in July. The room was spacious and comfortable. The pool was great. Breakfast has a nice variety of hot and cold food. The staff were very helpful and friendly. There is even a small number of books to check out which can be returned at any Country Inn and Suite Hotel. I really enjoyed my stay and the price was incredible.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

reviews.text: Staying in this hotel was great. It was so clean and comfortable. This is the first time I've stayed in a hotel for three days straight since I was a kid and I didn't want to leave. I even swam in the pool which I never do. Breakfast was good. Use of the computer is free. The workout room was clean. I especially loved coming home to a clean bed and new toiletries every day. Overall great stay.
reviews.title: Value and Comfort!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am Raj Gandhi and my wife Donna stayed at the country inn in June 2010. We had and excellent time. The service was perfect and glitch free. Staff was courteous. Morning breakfast was nice. We were impressed with cleanliness and comfort.
reviews.title: Excellent, simple and stress free

reviews.text: The management and some staff were very rude. Our room was never serviced and we stayed over a week. We had to remove our own garbage, linens, had to go get everything ourselves and even make our own beds!
reviews.title: Would Not recommend....

reviews.text: This hotel is located in sort of an industrial park-kind of neighborhood, so there's nothing much immediately adjacent. But a quick drive will take you to everything you need. Plus, we found its location convenient to everything we wanted to do in Tampa, including being just minutes away from the airport. The room was very comfortable, new-looking and very clean. The included breakfast was adequate. I wished it was available later than the 9:30 a.m. deadline, but that's probably because I wasn't adjusted to the local time zone. Our room had everything we needed. And even though the hotel was directly in the airport's flight path, we never heard a sound in our room. Staff was efficient and accommodating. A good place for a good night's sleep.
reviews.title: Very comfortable

reviews.text: One of the clients chose this hotel, so we all stayed there for 1 night in August, 2010. It was new, room was clean and comfortable, thermostat and A/C worked well (a definite plus in the heat and humidity of a Florida August!), and the free breakfast buffet was good. Since the room was under $70, I think it represented good value.
reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive place close to the airport

reviews.text: One tip- There is an auto shop right behind the hotel, and one of the guys had a room on the ground floor close to it. He was kept awake until late because of work being done at the shop, and the view from his window was of a wall. By contrast my room was on the front of the hotel and was wonderfully quiet, so I think you may prefer a higher floor in the front.
reviews.title: Great stay at Country Inn & Suites Tampa Airport

reviews.text: Great stay at this hotel, arrived a little early no problem in checking in. Breakfast was Hot and Good !!! Room was clean and fresh smelling. Plus the added benefit of Jazzy's BBQ across the street. The BEST !!!!
reviews.title: Wrong Foot, Made Right

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we pulled upto the hotel, it had just been robbed. We hesitated to go in because of the two squad cars. We also noticed the airplane passing over every five minutes (it's in the middle of the flight pattern). When we checked in they assigned room 201, which hadn't had maid service and there were beer bottles.
reviews.title: Bad room, horrible breakfast, poor service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a very nice & beautiful hotel.....but still very comfy and cozy! The staff made me feel very welcomed and at home.....they were so helpful! I will definitely be staying here again!!!
reviews.title: Sincerely feels like a home away from home!

reviews.text: The word comfort in the dictionary would offer this motel as a explanation. Managers were so kind and offering any needs met with enthusiam and a smile. I usually don't go to the effort to offer thanks in this way but with this kind service I had to.
reviews.title: such great hospitality

reviews.text: This hotel had just opened a week before I stayed there. They were still ironing out a few wrinkles (phone didn't work) but the staff was extremely helpful and gave immediate attention to such details. Very clean, great price, good value.
reviews.title: New & Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is included & the waffles are really tasty.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: The staff knows how to treat customers. I truly felt like a guest in someone's house. They were constantly concerned that my stay was everything it should be. I will stay here my next trip to Tampa.
reviews.title: Very convenient for short face to face business meeting

reviews.text: We only stayed here for one night as we are flying out the next day. Based on reviews by fellow guests, chose this hotel. All the good things said about this hotel turn out to be exactly as they are. Nice, clean, close to the airport. We spent the day in Clearwater Beach area and it's not far from the hotel. The business centre is free and you do your on line check in there. Wish I can stay a few more days here. Definitely recommend this hotel to anyone for the price, service, facilities, etc.
reviews.title: Very impressed with this property

reviews.text: My experience at country Inn and Suites was a memorable one. All the staff was so welcoming and so hospitable. Every morning,the wake up calls were always on time, towels were ready to go and when we came back from site seeing, all the beds were nicely made. The atmosphere is very cozy and I really did feel like I was at home.The location is also amazing with so much to do and so many restaurants just a few miles away. I would recommend this to all people.
reviews.title: Home Away from Home

reviews.text: I had a very warm experience at this country inn. I have been to the tampa metropolitan area numerous times but have not had such a smooth and comfortable stay as I did on this visit. In fact, I am not one to write reviews but I had a such a great experience I felt it was my responsibility to give kudos where it is deserved.
reviews.title: Amazing Hospitality and genuinely caring staff
Great stay!
reviews.text: Staying at Country Inn and Suites was a great choice! Having been in Tampa for a conference, it was nice to escape the business in the relaxing environment of the hotel!

The Country Inn & Suites Tampa Airport N was a very pleasent surprise . We have traveled all around the country visiting ballparks and have never heard of Country Inn & Suites before , so when we booked these rooms on our visit to Tampa to see the Yankees Spring Training we did not know what to expect . The employees and Management were very courteous and accomodating . The rooms were immaculate and the service was great . The breakfast every morning was excellent and the waffles were delicious thanks to the woman employee stationed at the breakfast room . We may be traveling to Texas later this summer to see the Texas Rangers and the Houston Astros ballparks and the first thing we will do is to see if there is a Country Inn and Suites in the area . Great job to the ownership and management at the Country Inn & Suites Tampa Airport N .
reviews.title: Great Experiance in Tampa

aka: Country Inn & Suites Tampa Airport n Hotel Tampa
